PRINT.quoteCustomerGreetings2: The details of your quote are below, but if you have any changes, just let us know. We look forward to working with you.
PRINT.priceMorethan3000Msg: In order to provide you the best price, Staples will review your quote, and contact you within 3 business hours Monday-Friday 8am-5pm local time.
PRINT.noteSavings: Note: Your savings may not be reflected in total price.
PRINT.bdpInstantSavings: BDP instant savings and Staples Rewards will be applied based on final quote value
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer1: For online orders, please have a valid ID along with a copy of this order confirmation. Once your online order is produced, your credit card will be charged and you will receive a "Ready for Pickup" notification email. If the Rush selection or any part of your order cannot be fulfilled, your online order will be canceled and you still have the option to pick up your order and pay for it in store.
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer2: Tax will be calculated during checkout at the store if applicable. Coupons are accepted at the store upon pickup. Any alterations to this quote's specifications will require a re-quote to be provided. Visit
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer4: By requesting this quote, you authorize Staples to follow up with you by phone to clarify and/or finalize the scope and details of the quote.
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer5: Restrictions apply. Must be a member of Staples Rewards. Please see
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer8: Staples Rewards are mailed quarterly only if the value of the reward is at least $10. Any unpaid balances under $10 expire after the end of the calendar year. Learn more at
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer9: If you find a lower price on a new, identical item, just show us the lower price when you buy the item at Staples, we will match the price. If you purchase an item from Staples and tell us within 14 days that you found that item at a lower price in our stores or at
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer10: we will refund the difference. Staples Price Match Policy covers items sold and shipped directly by
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer11: and sold by any retailer who sells products in both retail stores and online under the same brand. Excludes Staples® EasyTech services; Copy & Print products produced by third-party vendors; custom print and promotional products; postage; gift and phone cards; and apps sold on the
PRINT.quoteDisclaimer12: App Center. For full details, see a store associate or go to

REWARDSENROLLMENT.rewardsSubTitle: Staples makes it easy to save on everything

moneyBack.title: Up to 5% back in rewards off everything.
moneyBack.info: Earn up to 5% back in rewards on everything in store and online. Not valid on postage, gift/phone  cards and savings passes.

shipping.title: Free shipping on Staples.com.
shipping.info: Whatever your business needs, we will deliver it all for free. No minimums

bonusEvents.title: Bonus Events.
bonusEvents.info: Earn extra rewards on certain products throughout the year

inkRecyclingAwards.title: Ink recycling rewards.
inkRecyclingAwards.info: Earn $2 back in rewards for every ink or toner cartridge you recycle. Minimum purchase requirements must be met.
